name: Dream Hills: Captured Magic
description: A treacherous witch has cast Dream Hills into darkness, depriving its residents of happiness and joy. Save your favorite fairy tale characters, break the curse, and restore Dream Hills to its former glory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
